name: Get to the green light 2 demo 2
name_original: Get to the green light 2 demo 2
description:
DEMO 1

This is a early beta version of the game. It will be up for 3 months and then deleted.

Description:

This is a platformer  somewhat like Mario but has a more interactive story(when it is done).

The game is planned to release in Dec 30, 2021. I plan to put the game on steam if it does well on itch. I also plan on having devlogs and demos of the game till it gets to a finished state. If it gets finished state I will still work on it and maybe add multiplayer.
